title: League Client Settings Reset - Set Item Pages Gone
body:
Hello,

when I logged into my account this morning, a window popped up with the following message:
_**"We were unable to retrieve your settings from the server; they've been reset. Click Settings to review them."**_

I clicked OK, and when I entered a game I noticed that all my in-game settings were back to their default. While this is easily fixable, the main issue I noticed was that my set item page wasn't available anymore. Turns out ALL my set items pages have been deleted. 

I checked my second account and received the same message. A friend of mine logged onto my account on his computer, to check if my computer was the issue, and he yet again received the error message. I did not mess with any settings or League folders prior to this, and I was able to play on my account last night without any issues. 

I put a lot of time and effort into my set item pages, so is there any way to retrieve them? Have others experienced this issue, or is this connected to my account specifically? What can I do to avoid this problem in the future?

Any help would be appreciated!
Thank you

replies.body: This was done intentionally while our techs look into certain issues! Be sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for when server-side settings will be reenabled.
Will our server settings automatically overwrite our current settings? Or will our current settings overwrite our saved settings on the server?

Not 100% on this, but I believe the server settings will overwrite your local ones when they come back up. Not actually even sure if your old settings will be recovered, but it sounds like they should come back.
Broporo can i get end of season rewards if i got a 14 day banned recently but right now am unbanned and unlocked honor again?
8/22 is the cutoff. Any 2 week punishment after that will forfeit ranked rewards.
Broporo, will our old settings come back once the preferences have been re-enabled?
My settings keep reseting when i switch accounts, really annoying. Never had this issue before
happens when logging in and out of the same account as well.
nevermind. after loading the client it went back to what i just input 5 minutes earlier

I AM FURIOUS. All my settings are reset. It just happened 30 minutes ago. I was playing a game before that everything was fine. and now i log into another account and it is all GONE
SEND HELP

I hope they can fix this :( i put my heart into my item sets and i don't want to rebuild my heart

Hey everyone,

_**looks like the Item Set pages are back :)**_

Thanks a lot for all the feedback, really helped a lot to know I wasn't the only one who encountered that problem and that Riot was working on fixing it! :)

Those persisted settings were disabled so that the devs could investigate what might have been causing a couple issues. Be sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates on their progress!
so are our settings going to be back to normal, item sets ext. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
same issue
This is absolutely ridiculous, i don't know my settings so now I need to find a new sensitivity and adjust. Once again thanks for screwing us over riot.
RIOTTTTTT WHERE ARE MY SETTINGS I WANT MY EXACT MOUSE SENSITIVITY SETTINGS OR IM GONNA MOVE TO OVERWATCH
Happened to me too, so frustrating... {{summoner:3}}
so the item sets ive been making over like 8 months are gone and i have to do it again good job riot {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Same here. Great. Literally logged onto my other account after a game and the message pops out.. well, i guess i wont be playing for a while.
Same happening to me. RIOT  FiX ASAP this drives everyone crazy

Same thing, here. If this isn't fixed, I'm just quitting this game. It's easily multiple hours to fix all the item sets and keybindings on both accounts. The default settings surprise you in new and horrifying ways that nobody can remember. Like, why is the default UI **all **of your screen? Oh well, guess I'll save money on buying RP.

Yup, and when relogging into both accounts, you have to reset your setting AGAIN. 

I'm weird with sensitivity, and my in game settings, so this drives my OCD crazy..

Wonder if they've done this to stop things such as multiple accounts, and to throw people off? Sounds dumb though.
Same here, please fix!
Same here , it happens on every account i tried

Same has happened to me. I haven't touched my league since about 2 weeks (-/+ some days), since I was on vacation. I have left open the client, when I came back I had to restart it due to a client update, so did I and it patched league after the client update. When I logged in I recieved this message and it reset my stuff on my main and on my smurf, multiple times, it is extremely tilting imo. Glad I am not the only one who has to go through this pain, I hope it will get fixed asap. What I have noticed though is, since I took some screenshots before I went on vacation, of my settings (cause I am weird kappa), that some options were not available now, like 'show slows in  Loss of Control UI' or the whole emote things were not there, while they were there before the client update and the patch/es.

Best regards.
ahhhh so much time put into making these item sets.
getting this as well, frustrating. glad im not the only one.
Same thing happened to me, cost me a game because I had all custom settings and had to fix them on the fly. Really not sure how this could happen considering the client upgrade...
